title: Arsenal transfer news: Lucas Perez 'confused' by Arsene Wenger and wants to leave | Metro News
text:
Lucas Perez ‘confused’ by Arsene Wenger and ready to leave Arsenal this summer gossip Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 4:01 pm Lucas Perez could leave Arsenal this summer (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal forward Lucas Perez is reportedly ‘confused’ by Arsene Wenger’s treatment of him this season and could leave the club for regular first team football this summer. 
The Spaniard moved to the Gunners in a £17million deal from Deportivo in the dying days of last summer’s transfer window and he’s impressed when given the chance this season. Paul Pogba shows brotherly love after Florentin is forced off injured 
The 29-year-old’s made just 17 appearances for Wenger’s side this term but he has a very credible eight goals to his name. 
However, according to Goal , Perez is baffled as to why he’s constantly overlooked by Wenger and is seriously considering his future at the club. Perez has impressed when given the chance (Picture: Getty) 
Mesut Ozil and Theo Walcott have been out of form in recent weeks but that’s not resulted in more game time for Perez and he believes he should have been afforded more chances over the course of the season. 
Playing heavily on Perez’s mind is Spain’s World Cup squad in 2018 and the forward believes he has little chance of making it if he stays at the Emirates.
